Th=
e qr100, i never got anything on. It sounds nothing like the rr-dr60. The 1=
00 and 200 look and sound the same, but i've had success with the 200.

The=
 dr60 is in a class by itself, it's so muddy and distorted sounding. The 10=
0 and 200 are nice and clear sounding.

S-H
